channel.title: Few easy questions
channel.description: How do we take screenshots? How do we put gold and silver crowns next to players names on the forums?[br][size=1]Posted on: June 17, 2007, 09:04:56 PM[/size][hr]really appreciate if you helped[br][size=1]Posted on: June 17, 2007, 09:05:39 PM[/size][hr]bump

item.title: Few easy questions
item.dc:creator: @t_cups t cups
item.description:
@t_cups wrote:

manâ€¦for the screenshots look at the stickies!!!
and to put a crown next to someones name go into character files in your source folder, then find the guys name and double click it, then change the player rights to: 1 for moderator, 2 for admin, 3 for owner.

Read full topic
